content.text: An AI-powered web app for script breakdown and storyboard visualization

Script Viz was one of the first products I worked on when I joined Viga. I had joined as a UI/UX Intern, working under an existing UX Designer at Viga. The color theme and main screens of Script Viz were already designed and implemented by the time I joined, so my job was to further improve the branding & user experience of the product.

content.heading: Branding
content.para: I designed the logo for Script Viz and mascot illustrations to accompany the branding. I was inspired by Duolingoâ€™s approach to mascot branding and tried something similar for Script Viz.

nextWorkDescription: An AI-powered web app to simulate table reads for film scripts.
